# `src/data/objects/navigation.json`

<!--
source: src/data/objects/navigation.json
category: data
importance: low
-->

> [← Architecture Index](./architecture.index.md)

## Goal

Shared navigation data object providing primary and secondary nav items for scene compositions.

## Composition

- **`primary`** — Array of 4 items: Overview, Issues, Pull Requests, Discussions (each with label, url, icon)
- **`secondary`** — Array of 2 items: Settings, Help
